title: Biobusiness: Small to Large I
description: First in a two-quarter series focusing on early stages of a business plan. Biotech is a special breed of business, especially in the start-up and early phases. You will study and analyze (1) start-up proposals, (2) the genesis of the biotech industry, (3) biotech categories and growth strategies, (4) the process of spinning out viable product concepts from academia, (5) financing techniques, (6) business development, (7) acquisition/IPO valuation methods, and (8) potentially disruptive technologies. Students may not receive credit for both MDE 225 and MDE 225A. Prerequisites: MDE students only.
